entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 11.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High minus 13.
